title: How long will the account recovery take
body: my account has been hacked and i sent a ticket for it and has been a week. how long is gonna take to recover my account?? i spent alot of RP on that account feelsbad.

replies.body:
I'm unable to give you an accurate estimate as to how long your recovery will take, as it depends on a lot of factors. What I can tell you is that we've had a lot of tickets submitted recently, so response times are *a bit longer* than normal, but regardless, our specialists are working their butts off to get back to everyone.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
